ids_info.name: plasma_initiation
ids_info.description: Description the early phases of the plasma, before an equilibrium can be calculated

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/b_fi.documentation: Stray magnetic field at plasma position
Perpendicular magnetic field at plasma position. b_field_perpendicular = sqrt(b_field_stray^2+b_field_eddy^2)

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/conn.documentation: Average length of open magnetic field lines. In the case of fully closed field lines, connection_length = 1

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/ip.documentation: Total plasma current (toroidal component). Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewed from above.

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/t_e_.documentation: Volume averaged electron temperature (average over the plasma volume up to the LCFS)

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/n_e_.documentation: Volume averaged electron density (average over the plasma volume up to the LCFS)

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/ion.documentation: Quantities related to the different ion species, in the sense of isonuclear or isomolecular sequences

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/ion/.documentation: List of elements forming the atom or molecule
Number of atoms of this element in the molecule
Ion charge (of the dominant ionization state; lumped ions are allowed), volume averaged over plasma radius
String identifying the species (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, D2, DT, CD4, ...)
Index of the corresponding neutral species in the ../../neutral array
Volume averaged temperature of this ion species (averaged over the plasma volume up to the LCFS)
Volume averaged density of this ion species (averaged over the plasma volume up to the LCFS)

plasma_initiation/global_quantities/neut.documentation: Quantities related to the different neutral species
List of elements forming the atom or molecule
Number of atoms of this element in the molecule
String identifying the species (e.g. H, D, T, He, C, D2, DT, CD4, ...)
Index of the corresponding neutral species in the ../../ion array
Volume averaged temperature of this neutral species (averaged over the plasma volume up to the LCFS)
Volume averaged density of this neutral species (averaged over the plasma volume up to the LCFS)

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines.documentation: Magnetic field line tracing results, given at various time slices

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/grid_typ.documentation: Selection of one of a set of grid types
Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index.

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/grid.documentation: Definition of the 2D grid (the content of dim1 and dim2 is defined by the selected grid_type)

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/grid/vol.documentation: Elementary plasma volume of plasma enclosed in the cell formed by the nodes [dim1(i) dim2(j)], [dim1(i+1) dim2(j)], [dim1(i) dim2(j+1)] and [dim1(i+1) dim2(j+1)]

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/townsend.documentation: List of all R, Z positions along all field lines encoutering Townsend condition or being closed field lines
List of all R, Z grid positions (from ../grid) containing field lines encoutering Townsend condition or being closed field lines

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/starting.documentation: Starting position to initiate field line tracing, for each field line

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/e_field_.documentation: Townsend electric field along each field line
Parallel electric field along each field line

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/pressure.documentation: Prefill gas pressure used in Townsend E field calculation

plasma_initiation/b_field_lines/open_fra.documentation: Fraction of open field lines : ratio open fields lines / (open+closed field lines)

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d.documentation: 2D profiles in the poloidal plane, given at various time slices

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d/grid_type.documentation: Selection of one of a set of grid types

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d/grid_type/.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index.

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d/grid.documentation: Definition of the 2D grid (the content of dim1 and dim2 is defined by the selected grid_type)

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d/grid/volum.documentation: Elementary plasma volume of plasma enclosed in the cell formed by the nodes [dim1(i) dim2(j)], [dim1(i+1) dim2(j)], [dim1(i) dim2(j+1)] and [dim1(i+1) dim2(j+1)]

plasma_initiation/profiles_2d/e_field_ph.documentation: Toroidal component of the electric field
